website_summaries.verdict: A silica supplement that contains bioflavenoids and is derived from horsetail herb extract.
pros: Provides the pure ortho form of soluble/colloidal silica
Consumers have seen positive results in their hair and nails
cons: Some users have been advised not to take it due to the ingredients

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. The only brand recommended by Chris Barr ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. The only brand recommended by Chris Barr (I recommend people read his article on top 5 nutrients to take) for Silica.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great supplement. My thin hair is full again
customer_reviews.text: Great supplement. My thin hair is full again, even my hair dresser noticed and wanted to know what I was doing. I actually had taken the bottle with me and showed it to her. She took a picture of the bottle and said she is going to order it for herself.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriele Joiner

customer_reviews.title: I have osteoporosis and have used Alta Silica along with ...
customer_reviews.text: I have osteoporosis and have used Alta Silica along with Vit. D3 and K2 for years to strengthen my bones at the recommendation of my homeopathic doctor. I had to stop taking Fasomax because of the discovery that people using it break bones. I have fallen a few times over the years and have yet to break a bone. I haven't had a bone density test for quite a while, but the regimen I am on seems to be working for me.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Contains dairy.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't read the label close enough, I am allergic to dairy, and this contains whey for some reason. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: D. S. Tait

customer_reviews.title: Good supplement, has strengthened my bones
customer_reviews.text: Been using since 1992. Good supplement, has strengthened my bones, hair.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle O

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend this product. My hair and nails have never looked so good until I started taking two pills in the morning and two pills at night. Thank goodness for this product. S. Harris
customer_reviews.author: J. Harris

customer_reviews.title: ... taking these to increase bone density but have noticed great improvement with my nails and hair
customer_reviews.text: I am taking these to increase bone density but have noticed great improvement with my nails and hair. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes a noticeable difference
customer_reviews.text: Definitely notice a big difference when I don't use these. The dosage is 1-3 tablets; I alternate between taking 1 and 2 tablets every other day so I haven't even needed the full dose to see a difference.
customer_reviews.author: N S

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: I never really believed in vitamins to be honest until I started taking silica for my hair nails and skin. Have reordered and will continue to do so. My hair has been better than ever
customer_reviews.author: yaycourtney

customer_reviews.title: Very good for your skin
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Hair, skin look much better Definitely I gonna keep buying this product

customer_reviews.title: No flavor and it wasn't expensive at all.
customer_reviews.text: Can't tell if it's helping for pain I was ask to buy it to help with my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Laura jones

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: Really works. I lost a great deal of weight, and was loosing hair as well. Tried a variety of things and a hair dresser friend of mine said Silica was only thing she knew of that worked. I use is daily and can see a real difference. Anyone who cuts majority of the fat and oil out of their diet will also loose hair. I recommend it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Cowan

customer_reviews.title: Clears Acne
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to clear up my skin and it’s amazing! My acne significantly decreases and my face glows! Even my hair looks better!

customer_reviews.title: Alta Health Silica Tablets.
customer_reviews.text: They appear to work at making your nails much stronger as for the rest we'll see.

customer_reviews.title: One part of a natural treatment protocal
customer_reviews.text: It is helping my husband in his fight against lung cancer. It can also help acid reflux problems.

customer_reviews.title: He said that he is feeling better.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son, he is a diabetic. He said that he is feeling better.

customer_reviews.title: This product works.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this tablets for a couple of years now. They have made the difference between keeping my hair (very thin and scarce), and losing it (where I was definitely heading). I have used many over the counter "similar" items; however, they have done nothing for me. This product does work; it will help you keep your hair (my experience), and even regrow it.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: No pain any more
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis all right side. Been a prescription Meloxicam for 8 years .I keep trying supplements for replace Meloxicam. Finally I found this one,after 2 weeks I stop taking Meloxicam. No pain any more.
customer_reviews.author: Zee

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Started taking this supplement after being diagnosed with osteoporosis. After 10 months my scans showed a marked improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Excellent food grade silica
customer_reviews.text: A must for skin, nails, hair and bones. Excellent food grade silica. Highly absorbable and can be taken on an empty stomach with no problems.

product_meta.title: Alta Health SIL-X-Silica Tablets, 120 Count
product_meta.description: Alta Health silica with bioflavonoids is the natural nutrient for hair, bones and nails.
feature_bullets: Strengthens and supports healthy skin, hair, bones and nails
Provides the pure ortho form of soluble/colloidal silica
Provides the best absorption and assimilation
